name: My First Game Jam: Winter 2023 (Incomplete)
description:
Hello

The goal of the game is to get items to grow a plant. Controls are WASD + Space. (technically "AD") That's it.

The music and the uh art are placeholders. It isn't finished but most of the uh gameplay is there so yeah. Have fun.

Thanks for visiting. 

Credits

Google Font: Itim by Cadson Demak

Door SFX: Iwan Gabovitch at opengameart.org

Music: Bossa Nova by Joth at  opengameart.org

.>.
